ingredients.ingredient: diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

cookingTips: Brown sausage thoroughly and break it into small pieces for even distribution in the dip
Stir cream cheese and tomato mixture frequently while heating to ensure smooth consistency
Serve warm with tortilla chips or crackers for a classic game-day appetizer
